description: Name of the workgroup or fleet program this location belongs to; likely a system-wide identifier used to group related locations. Confirm exact scope with SME.
Short, unique code for the location or shop within the fleet system; used in references and reporting.
User ID of the person or process that created the location record.
Date and time the location record was created (system create timestamp).
User ID of the person or process that last modified the location record; may be null if never updated.
Date and time the location record was last modified; null if never updated.
Human-readable name/description of the location or shop for users and reports.
